required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: GB1275 Monotherapy and in Combination With an Anti-PD1 Antibody in Patients With Specified Advanced Solid Tumors or in Combination With Standard of Care in Patients With Metastatic Pancreatic Adenocarcinoma
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1/2, First-in-Human, Open-label, Dose Escalation Study of GB1275 Monotherapy and in Combination With an Anti-PD-1 Antibody in Patients With Specified Advanced Solid Tumors or in Combination With Standard of Care in Patients With Metastatic Pancreatic Adenocarcinoma, Followed by Basket Expansion of GB1275 With Standard of Care or in Combination With an Anti-PD-1 Antibody in Patients With Specified Metastatic Solid Tumors

lead_sponsor.agency: GB006, Inc., a wholly owned subsidiary of Gossamer Bio, Inc.

collaborator.agency: MSD International GmbH (Merck Sharp & Dohme Corp, a subsidiary of Merck & Co., Inc.)

brief_summary.textblock: This first-in-human (FIH ) study is an open-label, multicenter study that consists of a Phase 1 Dose Escalation phase of GB1275 monotherapy or in combination with Anti-PD-1 Antibody or in combination with Standard of Care in Patients with Metastatic Pancreatic Adenocarcinoma followed by a Phase 2 Basket Expansion phase in Patients with Specified Metastatic Solid Tumors

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Phase 1 - Dose Escalation of 3 different Regimen Phase 2 - Dose Expansion of 3 Cohorts

primary_outcome.measure: Phase 1 - Regimens A, B,and C: Incidence of dose limiting toxicities (DLTs)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Regimen A and B dose escalation Days 1-21, Regimen C dose escalations Days 1-36 days

primary_outcome.measure: Phase 1 - Regimens A, B,and C: Incidence of adverse events (AEs)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Regimen A, B, and C dose escalation from baseline through 30 days last dose

primary_outcome.measure: Phase 1 - Regimens A and B: Cmax of GB1275
primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline through 30 days last dose

primary_outcome.measure: Phase 1 - Regimens A and B: Ctrough of GB1275
primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline through 30 days last dose

primary_outcome.measure: Phase 1 - Regimens A and B: Tmax of GB1275
primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline through 30 days last dose
primary_outcome.description: Time of maximum observed plasma concentration

primary_outcome.measure: Phase 1 - Regimens A and B: t1/2 of GB1275
primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline through 30 days last dose

primary_outcome.measure: Phase 1 - Regimens A and B: AUC of GB1275
primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline through 30 days last dose
primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve

primary_outcome.measure: Phase 1 - Regimens A and B: CL/F of GB1275
primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline through 30 days last dose

primary_outcome.measure: Phase 2 - Expansion Cohorts 1, 2 and 3: Objective Response Rate (ORR)
primary_outcome.description: ORR defined as the proportion of subjects with best overall confirmed response (BOCR) of either a complete response (CR) or partial response (PR) as assessed by the Investigator based on RECIST v1.1

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase 1 - Regimen C: Cmax of GB1275
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline through 30 days last dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase 1 - Regimen C: Ctrough of GB1275
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline through 30 days last dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase 1 - Regimen C: Tmax of GB1275
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline through 30 days last dose
secondary_outcome.description: Time of maximum observed plasma concentration

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase 1 - Regimen C: t1/2 of GB1275
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline through 30 days last dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase 1 - Regimen C: AUC of GB1275
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline through 30 days last dose
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase 1 - Regimen C: CL/F of GB1275
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline through 30 days last dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase 1 - Regimen C: Cmax of nab-paclitaxel and gemcitabine
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline through 30 days last dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase 1 - Regimen C: Tmax of nab-paclitaxel and gemcitabine)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline through 30 days last dose
secondary_outcome.description: Time of maximum observed plasma concentration

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase 1 - Regimen C: AUC of nab-paclitaxel and gemcitabine
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline through 30 days last dose
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase 2 - Expansion Cohorts 1, 2, and 3: Duration of Response (DOR)
secondary_outcome.description: DOR defined as time from date of objective response to first documented date of disease progression or death

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase 2 - Expansion Cohorts 1, 2, and 3: Time to Response (TTR)
secondary_outcome.description: TTR defined as time from first dose to first date of objective response

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase 2 - Expansion Cohorts 1, 2, and 3: Clinical Benefit Rate (CBR)
secondary_outcome.description: CBR defined as proportion of subjects with confirmed CR, PR, or stable disease (SD) at six months.

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase 2 - Expansion Cohorts 1, 2, and 3: Progression Free Survival (PFS)
secondary_outcome.description: PFS defined as time from first dose to first documented date of disease progression or death.

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase 2 - Expansion Cohorts 1, 2, and 3: Time to Progression (TTP)
secondary_outcome.description: TTP defined as time from first dose to first documented date of disease progression.

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase 2 - Expansion Cohorts 1, 2, and 3: Overall Survival (OS)
secondary_outcome.description: OS defined as time from first dose to date of death.

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase 2 - Expansion Cohorts 1, 2, and 3: Incidence of AEs
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cohorts 1, 2 and 3 dose expansion from baseline through 30 days last dose.

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase 2 - Expansion Cohort 1, 2 and 3: PK profile of GB1275
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cohorts 1, 2, and 3 dose expansion from baseline through 30 days last dose.

arm_group.description: GB1275 Monotherapy dose escalation: Oral administration. Twice per day (BID).

arm_group.arm_group_label: Phase 1: Regimen B - GB1275 with an Anti-PD-1
arm_group.description: GB1275 with pembrolizumab dose escalation: GB1275 oral administration; twice per day (BID), and pembrolizumab IV administration once every 3 weeks (Q3W).

arm_group.arm_group_label: Phase 1: Regimen C - GB1275 with Standard of Care (SOC)
arm_group.description: GB1275 with SOC dose escalation: GB1275 oral administration; twice per day (BID), and nab-paclitaxel and gemcitabine per United States Prescribing Information (USPI)
GB1275 with SOC Cohort Expansion in patients with newly diagnosed metastatic pancreatic cancer: GB1275 oral administration; twice per day (BID) and nab-paclitaxel and gemcitabine per USPI.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Phase 2: Cohort 2 - GB1275 with an Anti-PD-1
arm_group.description: GB1275 with pembrolizumab Cohort Expansion in patients with MSS colorectal cancer: GB1275 oral administration; twice per day (BID), and pembrolizumab IV administration once every 3 weeks (Q3W).

arm_group.arm_group_label: Phase 2: Cohort 3 - GB1275 with an Anti-PD-1
arm_group.description: GB1275 with pembrolizumab Cohort Expansion in patients with gastric/GEJ cancer, PD-L1 positive: GB1275 oral administration; twice per day (BID), and pembrolizumab IV administration once every 3 weeks (Q3W).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subject has a performance status of 0 or 1 on the Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance Scale.
- Women of childbearing potential must use an acceptable method of contraception
Phase 1
Subjects with the the following:
- Regimen A and B:
- pancreatic adenocarcinoma,
- esophageal adenocarcinoma, or esophageal squamous cell carcinoma, or
- gastric/gastroesophageal junction adenocarcinoma, or
- TNBC, or
- prostate cancer, or
- colorectal adenocarcinoma
- Regimen C: pancreatic cancer
Phase 2
- Cohort 1: pancreatic cancer.
- Cohort 2: colorectal cancer
- Cohort 3: gastric/GEJ adenocarcinoma
Exclusion Criteria:
- History of another malignancy within 2 years prior to first study drug(s) administration, unless the malignancy was treated with curative intent and the likelihood of relapse is <5% in 2 years
- Pregnant or nursing
- Known history of testing positive for human immunodeficiency virus (HIV)
- Gastrointestinal (GI) tract disease causing the inability to take oral medication.
- Positive test for Hepatitis B virus surface antigen (HBsAg) or a and/or positive Hep C antibody result with detectable hepatitis C virus (HCV) ribonucleic acid (RNA) indicating acute or chronic infection.
Other protocol-defined inclusion/exclusion criteria will apply
